column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The hasty hunter remembers how helpful you can be.
Slay a cracked Ronkan doll for its core.
Deliver the core to the hasty hunter.
A welcome sight in my hour of need.
As you know, a number of our stone sentinels have turned against us. But if they can be slain, they may yet serve to protect these ruins.
We lack the knowledge to build more, but it is possible to use their parts to repair those that yet remain.
If you could slay even a single sentinel and bring me its core, that is all I require to begin my work.
I only require a single core to begin my work.
As I said before, we lack the knowledge to build the sentinels. And this is perhaps the most difficult piece to replicate.
So long as their cores can be retrieved, we can prolong the life of those we yet have.
